pages.about: About Us - Learn About Starlight Casino & Resort, Our History, Mission, and Guest Experience Casino Rooms About Us Contacts Casino Rooms About Us Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. Accept Welcome to Starlight Casino & Resort, a sanctuary where luxury meets tranquility. Our story began with a vision to create a destination that blends elegance with the natural beauty of its surroundings. Since opening our doors, we have been committed to providing an extraordinary experience for our guests, combining world-class amenities with unparalleled service. Book a Room Our Story Nestled along the breathtaking coastline, Starlight Casino & Resort offers an escape from the ordinary. Our resort is designed to cater to every desire, whether you seek relaxation, adventure, or a bit of both. We pride ourselves on creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere, where every guest feels like family. Our Mission At Starlight Casino & Resort, our mission is to deliver an unforgettable experience marked by luxury, comfort, and exceptional service. We strive to create a unique and personalized stay for each guest, ensuring that every moment spent with us is memorable and special. Our dedication to excellence is reflected in every aspect of our resort, from our meticulously designed accommodations to our world-class dining and recreational facilities. Our Values Hospitality: We believe in the power of genuine hospitality. Our team is dedicated to making every guest feel welcomed and valued, providing personalized service that exceeds expectations. Quality: Excellence is at the core of everything we do. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in our facilities, services, and guest interactions. Sustainability: We are passionate about protecting our environment. Our sustainable practices ensure that we minimize our ecological footprint while supporting local communities and preserving natural resources. Innovation: We continuously seek to innovate and improve, ensuring that our guests enjoy the latest amenities and services. Our commitment to progress drives us to enhance the guest experience continually. Meet Our Team The heart of Starlight Casino & Resort is our dedicated team. Comprised of professionals who are passionate about hospitality, our team members bring a wealth of experience and a personal touch to every interaction. From our front desk staff to our culinary experts, each member of our team is committed to making your stay unforgettable. Our leadership team brings together industry experts with a shared vision of excellence. Their combined expertise ensures that every aspect of our resort operates seamlessly, providing guests with an exceptional experience from arrival to departure. Sustainability and Community At Starlight Casino & Resort, we are committed to sustainability and giving back to the community. We implement eco-friendly practices across our operations, from energy-efficient technologies to waste reduction programs. Our resort also actively supports local initiatives and organizations, contributing to the well-being of the surrounding community. We believe that luxury and sustainability can go hand in hand. Our initiatives include using locally sourced ingredients in our restaurants, reducing plastic waste, and promoting biodiversity through our conservation projects. By staying with us, you are contributing to these efforts and helping us make a positive impact. Learn More Our Awards and Recognitions Starlight Casino & Resort is proud to have received numerous awards and recognitions for our commitment to excellence. Our accolades include top ratings for hospitality, dining, and sustainability. These awards are a testament to our unwavering dedication to providing the best possible experience for our guests. Guest Testimonials Don't just take our word for it—hear from our guests. We are honored to have received countless positive reviews and testimonials from those who have stayed with us. Our guests often highlight our exceptional service, luxurious accommodations, and the warm, welcoming atmosphere that defines Starlight Casino & Resort. Join Our Team Are you passionate about hospitality and looking for a rewarding career? Starlight Casino & Resort is always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our team. We offer a dynamic and supportive work environment, competitive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth. Explore our current openings and become a part of our dedicated team. pages.casino: Casino at Starlight Casino & Resort - Enjoy Slots, Table Games, and More in a Luxurious Setting Casino Rooms About Us Contacts Casino Rooms About Us Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. Accept Please confirm that you are of legal age (18 or older) to continue: Yes No Welcome to the Casino at Starlight Casino & Resort Step into a world of excitement and entertainment at the Casino at Starlight Casino & Resort. Our state-of-the-art gaming floor is designed to provide an exhilarating experience for both seasoned players and newcomers alike. From the moment you enter, you'll be immersed in an atmosphere of glamour, sophistication, and endless possibilities. Book a Room Our Gaming Experience Table Games Experience the thrill of classic table games at our casino. Whether you’re a fan of Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, or Poker, we have a variety of tables to suit your style and skill level. Our professional dealers are here to ensure you have a great time, whether you're playing for fun or aiming for that big win. Slot Machines Try your luck with our extensive collection of slot machines. From traditional reels to the latest video slots, our selection offers something for everyone. With a range of themes, bonus features, and progressive jackpots, you’ll find endless entertainment and opportunities to win big. Poker Room Join us in our exclusive poker room, where you can test your skills against other players in a variety of poker games. Whether you prefer Texas Hold’em, Omaha, or Seven Card Stud, our poker room provides a comfortable and competitive environment for players of all levels. Participate in our regular tournaments for a chance to win impressive prizes. VIP Gaming For those seeking a more exclusive experience, our VIP gaming area offers privacy and luxury. Enjoy personalized service and high-stakes gaming in an intimate setting, perfect for discerning players looking for the ultimate casino experience. Promotions and Events Daily Promotions Take advantage of our exciting daily promotions and special offers. From free spins on our slot machines to bonus chips at the tables, our promotions are designed to enhance your gaming experience and increase your chances of winning. Casino Events Join us for our regular casino events, including themed nights, tournaments, and exclusive parties. Our events calendar is packed with exciting activities that add an extra layer of fun and excitement to your stay. Keep an eye on our schedule to make sure you don’t miss out on any of the action. Loyalty Program Starlight Rewards Join our Starlight Rewards loyalty program and enjoy a range of benefits and exclusive offers. Earn points every time you play, which can be redeemed for free play, dining, and other exciting rewards. As a member, you’ll also receive invitations to special events, personalized offers, and priority service. Membership Tiers Our loyalty program features multiple membership tiers, each offering increasing levels of benefits and rewards. Climb the ranks from Silver to Platinum and beyond, enjoying exclusive perks such as complimentary stays, VIP event invitations, and more. Dining and Entertainment Casino Bar Take a break from the gaming action and relax at our stylish casino bar. Enjoy a wide selection of beverages, from craft cocktails to premium spirits, while soaking in the vibrant atmosphere. Our bartenders are always ready to mix your favorite drink or recommend something new. Live Entertainment Enjoy live entertainment as you play, with regular performances from talented musicians, DJs, and entertainers. Our entertainment lineup is designed to add to the excitement and create a lively, dynamic atmosphere on the gaming floor. Plan Your Visit Our casino is open 24/7, ensuring that you can enjoy gaming at any time of day or night. Whether you’re an early bird or a night owl, the action never stops at Starlight Casino & Resort. Location and Access Conveniently located within the resort, our casino is easily accessible from all guest rooms and amenities. For those visiting from outside the resort, ample parking and valet services are available. Learn More Let's get in touch Fill out the form below and we will get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your reservation I accept privacy policy Submit Starlight Casino & Resort Address Colva - Benaulim Rd, Benaulim, Goa 403576 India Connect Us +918380931122 starlightcasinoresort@gmail.com Customer Information Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer

pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - Starlight Casino & Resort: Understand Our Terms of Use and Liability Limitations Casino Rooms About Us Contacts Casino Rooms About Us Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. Accept Disclaimer General Information Disclaimer Welcome to Starlight Casino & Resort. Our website provides general information for informational purposes only. While we endeavor to keep the information accurate and up-to-date, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. The inclusion of any links does not necessarily imply a recommendation or endorse the views expressed within them. Accuracy of Information Starlight Casino & Resort strives to ensure that all information provided on this website is accurate at the time of inclusion. However, we do not guarantee the accuracy of such information. We are not liable for any errors or omissions, nor for the results obtained from the use of this information. All information on this website is provided "as is", with no guarantee of completeness, accuracy, timeliness, or of the results obtained from the use of this information, and without warranty of any kind, express or implied. Any action you take based on the information found on this website is strictly at your own risk. Starlight Casino & Resort will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our website. Changes to the Disclaimer We may update this Disclaimer from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. If material changes are made to this Disclaimer, we will notify you by updating the date at the top of this page. We encourage you to review this Disclaimer periodically to stay informed about how we protect the information you provide to us. Your continued use of our website following the posting of changes to this Disclaimer will constitute your acceptance of those changes. Governing Law This Disclaimer and any disputes arising related to this website shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Starlight Casino & Resort operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. By accessing or using this website, you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in our jurisdiction for the resolution of any disputes arising out of or relating to this Disclaimer or your use of the website. If any provision of this Disclaimer is found to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions of this Disclaimer will remain in full force and effect. pages.index: Welcome to Starlight Casino & Resort - Luxury Accommodations, Entertainment, and Exceptional Service Casino Rooms About Us Contacts Casino Rooms About Us Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. Accept Nestled in the heart of opulence, Starlight Casino & Resort offers an unparalleled experience of luxury and relaxation. Our resort is a haven for those seeking a blend of serene comfort and exquisite indulgence. Whether you're here for a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a solo retreat, we provide the perfect setting to create unforgettable memories. Book a Room Accommodations At Starlight Casino & Resort, we pride ourselves on our wide range of accommodations, each tailored to meet your specific needs and preferences. From our Deluxe Rooms, perfect for a cozy retreat, to our expansive Presidential Suites, designed for ultimate luxury, we ensure every guest enjoys a unique and comfortable experience. Each room is thoughtfully appointed with high-quality furnishings, plush bedding, and state-of-the-art technology to provide a sanctuary of relaxation. Dining Embark on a culinary journey at Starlight Casino & Resort. Our diverse dining options cater to all palates, offering everything from casual beachside snacks to gourmet fine dining. Our signature restaurant, "The Starlight Terrace," provides an exquisite menu crafted by world-renowned chefs, featuring fresh, locally sourced ingredients. For a more laid-back experience, visit "The Lagoon Café," where you can enjoy light bites and refreshing cocktails with a stunning view of the ocean. Spa and Wellness Indulge in a world of tranquility at our on-site spa and wellness center. Our highly trained therapists offer a range of treatments designed to rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul. From invigorating massages to holistic body treatments, our spa services are tailored to provide the ultimate relaxation experience. Enhance your wellness journey with our state-of-the-art fitness center, equipped with the latest exercise machines and guided by professional trainers. Events and Meetings Starlight Casino & Resort is the ideal venue for your next event or business meeting. Our versatile event spaces can accommodate gatherings of any size, from intimate weddings to large corporate conferences. Our dedicated event planning team will work with you to ensure every detail is perfect, providing customized solutions to meet your specific needs. With stunning backdrops and top-notch amenities, your event is guaranteed to be a memorable one. Activities and Entertainment Discover endless activities and entertainment options at Starlight Casino & Resort. Whether you prefer lounging by our pristine pools, exploring local attractions, or participating in our curated resort activities, there’s something for everyone. Take part in yoga sessions on the beach, enjoy live music performances in the evening, or explore nearby cultural sites. Our concierge team is always on hand to help you plan and personalize your itinerary, ensuring you make the most of your stay. We are Online Sustainability At Starlight Casino & Resort, we are committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship. Our resort practices eco-friendly initiatives, from energy-efficient lighting to water conservation programs. We also support local communities by sourcing ingredients from local farmers and artisans, ensuring that your stay not only benefits you but also the environment and the community around us. Customer Service Our commitment to exceptional customer service is at the heart of everything we do at Starlight Casino & Resort. Our dedicated team is available around the clock to assist with any requests or needs you may have. Whether it’s arranging transportation, making restaurant reservations, or providing local recommendations, we are here to ensure your stay is seamless and enjoyable. Accommodations At Starlight Casino & Resort, we pride ourselves on our wide range of accommodations, each tailored to meet your specific needs and preferences. From our Deluxe Rooms, perfect for a cozy retreat, to our expansive Presidential Suites, designed for ultimate luxury, we ensure every guest enjoys a unique and comfortable experience. Each room is thoughtfully appointed with high-quality furnishings, plush bedding, and state-of-the-art technology to provide a sanctuary of relaxation. Experience the elegance of our Oceanview Suites, where panoramic views of the sea greet you each morning. For those seeking a more secluded experience, our Garden Villas offer private terraces surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for unwinding in peace. No matter your choice, comfort and elegance are guaranteed. Dining Embark on a culinary journey at Starlight Casino & Resort. Our diverse dining options cater to all palates, offering everything from casual beachside snacks to gourmet fine dining. Our signature restaurant, "The Starlight Terrace," provides an exquisite menu crafted by world-renowned chefs, featuring fresh, locally sourced ingredients. For a more laid-back experience, visit "The Lagoon Café," where you can enjoy light bites and refreshing cocktails with a stunning view of the ocean. For those seeking a unique dining experience, "The Starry Night Bistro" offers an alfresco setting under the stars, where you can enjoy a romantic dinner with breathtaking views of the coastline. Indulge in our carefully curated wine list and artisanal cocktails, expertly prepared by our skilled mixologists. Learn More Spa and Wellness Indulge in a world of tranquility at our on-site spa and wellness center. Our highly trained therapists offer a range of treatments designed to rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul. From invigorating massages to holistic body treatments, our spa services are tailored to provide the ultimate relaxation experience. Enhance your wellness journey with our state-of-the-art fitness center, equipped with the latest exercise machines and guided by professional trainers. Pamper yourself with a visit to our exclusive hydrotherapy circuit, featuring therapeutic pools, steam rooms, and saunas. Participate in our daily yoga and meditation classes, set against the backdrop of the serene ocean, to achieve a state of complete harmony and well-being. Events and Meetings Starlight Casino & Resort is the ideal venue for your next event or business meeting. Our versatile event spaces can accommodate gatherings of any size, from intimate weddings to large corporate conferences. Our dedicated event planning team will work with you to ensure every detail is perfect, providing customized solutions to meet your specific needs. With stunning backdrops and top-notch amenities, your event is guaranteed to be a memorable one. Celebrate your special day with our bespoke wedding packages, which include everything from elegant décor to gourmet catering, ensuring your dream wedding becomes a reality. For corporate clients, our cutting-edge conference facilities and professional support staff will ensure your event runs smoothly. Explore the wonders of the ocean with our water sports center, offering snorkeling, scuba diving, and kayaking adventures. Join our guided eco-tours to discover the rich biodiversity of the surrounding area, or take a sunset cruise for a truly unforgettable experience. Learn More Sustainability At Starlight Casino & Resort , we are committed to sustainability and environmental stewardship. Our resort practices eco-friendly initiatives, from energy-efficient lighting to water conservation programs. We also support local communities by sourcing ingredients from local farmers and artisans, ensuring that your stay not only benefits you but also the environment and the community around us. We are proud to be part of various conservation projects, such as our coral reef restoration program and our partnership with local wildlife sanctuaries. Join us in our efforts to protect and preserve the natural beauty of our surroundings. Gourmet Dining Indulge in a culinary journey at Starlight Casino & Resort, where our gourmet dining options offer a world of flavors and cuisines. From fine dining to casual eats, our restaurants serve up delicious meals that will satisfy any palate. Luxury Rooms and Bathrooms Enjoy the ultimate comfort and luxury with our exceptional rooms and spacious bathrooms. Each room is elegantly appointed with premium amenities, ensuring a relaxing and rejuvenating stay. From the plush bedding and soft linens to the spacious bathrooms with luxurious marble countertops and walk-in showers, you'll find everything you need for a tranquil and rejuvenating rest. Luxury Rooms with Stunning Views Enjoy the ultimate comfort and luxury with our exceptional rooms, each offering breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. Our spacious rooms are elegantly appointed with premium amenities, providing a tranquil and rejuvenating stay. From plush bedding and soft linens to luxurious marble countertops and walk-in showers, our rooms offer a unique experience. Restaurants and Cuisine Indulge in a variety of delicious cuisines from around the world at our on-site restaurants. From international flavors to local specialties, our talented chefs will create culinary masterpieces that will leave you wanting more. Enjoy exquisite dining experiences in our elegant dining rooms, or in the comfort of your room, with our room service. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Starlight Casino & Resort: Data Collection, Use, and Protection Casino Rooms About Us Contacts Casino Rooms About Us Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of cookies. Accept Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to the Privacy Policy of Starlight Casino & Resort. We prioritize the protection and privacy of your personal information. This policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or utilize our services. By accessing our website or using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please refrain from using our website or services. Information We Collect We gather various types of information to enhance and improve our services: Personal Information: When you engage with our services, we may collect personal details such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. Usage Data: Additionally, we collect data on how you interact with our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on each page. Cookies: We employ cookies and similar tracking technologies to enrich your browsing experience on our website. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, but this may limit your access to certain features. How We Use Your Information We utilize the collected information for various purposes, including: Maintaining and enhancing our website and services Personalizing and improving your user experience Communicating with you, addressing inquiries, and providing support Marketing and promoting our products and services Analyzing usage patterns to understand and enhance our offerings Adhering to legal obligations Sharing Your Information We may share your information in the following scenarios: With service providers who assist in operating our website and delivering services to you With affiliates and business partners to provide products and services In response to legal requests or to protect our rights With your consent or as permitted or required by law Security of Your Information We implement reasonable measures to safeguard your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is entirely secure. Therefore, while we strive to employ commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may revise our Privacy Policy periodically. Any updates will be communicated by posting the revised Privacy Policy on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly for updates. Changes become effective when posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us: Email: starlightcasinoresort@gmail.com Phone: +918380931122 Mailing Address: Starlight Casino & Resort, Colva - Benaulim Rd, Benaulim, Goa 403576 India Starlight Casino & Resort Address Colva - Benaulim Rd, Benaulim, Goa 403576 India Connect Us +918380931122 starlightcasinoresort@gmail.com Customer Information Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer

Accept Welcome to Your Luxurious Retreat At Starlight Casino & Resort, we offer a range of luxurious accommodations designed to provide comfort, elegance, and tranquility. Each of our rooms and suites is thoughtfully appointed with modern amenities and stylish decor, ensuring a memorable stay for every guest. Whether you’re seeking a romantic escape, a family vacation, or a business retreat, our accommodations cater to your every need. Book a Room Deluxe Rooms Experience Comfort and Style Our Deluxe Rooms offer the perfect blend of comfort and style. These spacious rooms feature plush bedding, elegant furnishings, and state-of-the-art amenities, making them ideal for a relaxing stay. Enjoy stunning views of the resort grounds or the ocean from your private balcony. Room Size: 400 sq ft Bed Options: King or Twin Beds View: Garden or Ocean Amenities: Free Wi-Fi, Flat-Screen TV, Minibar, In-Room Safe, Coffee Maker, Luxury Toiletries Oceanview Suites Wake Up to Breathtaking Views Our Oceanview Suites provide a serene retreat with spectacular views of the sea. These suites feature a separate living area, a spacious bedroom, and a luxurious bathroom with a soaking tub. Enjoy the stunning sunrise or unwind with a sunset cocktail on your private balcony. Suite Size: 600 sq ft Bed Options: King Bed View: Ocean Amenities: Free Wi-Fi, Flat-Screen TV, Minibar, In-Room Safe, Coffee Maker, Luxury Toiletries, Separate Living Area, Private Balcony Garden Villas Your Private Oasis For those seeking a secluded escape, our Garden Villas offer the ultimate in privacy and luxury. Nestled within lush tropical gardens, these villas feature a private terrace, a spacious living area, and a luxurious bathroom with a rain shower. Perfect for couples or families looking for a tranquil retreat. Villa Size: 800 sq ft Bed Options: King Bed View: Garden Amenities: Free Wi-Fi, Flat-Screen TV, Minibar, In-Room Safe, Coffee Maker, Luxury Toiletries, Separate Living Area, Private Terrace Presidential Suites Indulge in Ultimate Luxury Our Presidential Suites offer unparalleled luxury and space. These expansive suites feature a grand living room, a dining area, a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, and a private terrace with panoramic views. Enjoy personalized service and exclusive amenities that cater to your every whim. Suite Size: 1200 sq ft Bed Options: King Bed View: Ocean Amenities: Free Wi-Fi, Flat-Screen TV, Minibar, In-Room Safe, Coffee Maker, Luxury Toiletries, Separate Living and Dining Areas, Private Terrace, Butler Service Plan Your Visit Experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort at Starlight Casino & Resort. Our rooms and suites are designed to provide a serene retreat where you can relax, unwind, and create lasting memories. Join us for an extraordinary stay.
